channel.title: extradimensional, storage on
channel.description: Recent content in extradimensional, storage on

item.description: [[Bag of Devouring]] Wondrous item, very rare This bag superficially resembles a bag of holding but is a feeding orifice for a gigantic extradimensional creature.
[[Bag of Holding]] Wondrous item, uncommon This bag has an interior space considerably larger than its outside dimensions, roughly 2 feet in diameter at the mouth and 4 feet deep.

[[Efficient Quiver]] Wondrous item, uncommon Each of the quiverâ€™s three compartments connects to an extradimensional space that allows the quiver to hold numerous items while never weighing more than 2 pounds.
